function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of PCR to test for Covid-19 may overestimate the incidence or intensity of existing infections due to RNA fragments from virus remnants","Impact":"Misleading data may lead to inaccurate estimations of the number of infected individuals in a community","Mitigation":"Implement biomarker testing to provide more accurate tracking of infection severity and avoid overestimation of infections","Technologies":"Biomarker testing technology","People":"Infected individuals, communities, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Inadequate surveillance systems may result in delayed detection of emerging clusters of infectious diseases","Impact":"Risk of uncontrolled spread of infectious diseases within communities","Mitigation":"Establish a nationwide system of community WBE monitoring to detect emerging clusters and generate maps for vulnerable areas","Technologies":"Community WBE monitoring technology","People":"Community members, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Infection densities revealed by WBE monitoring may uncover community vulnerabilities related to race, ethnicity, socioeconomic status, occupation, age structure, and climate","Impact":"Identifying disparities in vulnerability and susceptibility to infectious diseases within communities","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions and support for vulnerable communities to reduce disparities in susceptibility","Technologies":"Data analysis and targeted intervention technologies","People":"Vulnerable communities, public health authorities, government agencies","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"}]}
